name: Living Iron Statue
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
entries: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two attacks: one with its blade and one with its hammer.

actions.name: Blade
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hammer
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Whirl {@recharge 5}
entries: The statue can use its action to spin at the waist, targeting creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 19 (3d10 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
